summary: Strange things begin to happen when a group of friends gather for a dinner party on an evening when a comet is passing overhead.
cast: Emily Baldoni|Maury Sterling|Nicholas Brendon|Lorene Scafaria|Elizabeth Gracen|Hugo Armstrong|Alex Manugian|Lauren Maher|Aqueela Zoll|Carrie Patterson|Kelly Donovan|Alexis Boozer Sterling|Mark Ballou
title: Coherence
